info.description: A comprehensive Restaurant Management System API for managing users, menus, food items, orders, tables, invoices, and notes. Available on both local and online servers.
info.title: Restaurant Management API

post.description: Create a food item in the restaurant system

put.description: Update food item details by ID

get.description: Retrieve a food item by its ID
Retrieve a paginated list of all food items
get.summary: Get all food items with pagination

200.description: List of food items with pagination

post.description: Create a new invoice for an order with payment status and method

get.description: Retrieve invoice details with order items by invoice ID

put.description: Update invoice payment status and payment method by invoice ID

delete.description: Delete an invoice by invoice ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of all invoices

post.description: Create a new menu item with name and category

get.description: Retrieve menu details by menu ID

put.description: Update menu details by menu ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of all menus

post.description: Create a new note with title and text content

get.description: Retrieve note details by note ID

put.description: Update note details by note ID

delete.description: Delete a note by note ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of all notes

post.description: Create a new order for a table

get.description: Retrieve order details by order ID

put.description: Update order details by order ID

delete.description: Delete an order by order ID

post.description: Create one or more order items associated with an order
post.summary: Create order items for an order

parameters.description: Order items data with table_id and items list
parameters.name: orderItemPack

get.description: Retrieve all items for a specific order with details (food, table, etc)
get.summary: Get order items by order ID

200.description: List of order items with details

put.description: Update order item details by order item ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of all order items across all orders
Retrieve a list of all orders

post.description: Create a new restaurant table with number of guests and table number

get.description: Retrieve table details by table ID

put.description: Update table details by table ID

delete.description: Delete a table by table ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of all restaurant tables

post.description: Create a new user account with email, password, phone and personal information

parameters.description: User data (first_name, last_name, email, password, phone required)
parameters.name: user

get.description: Retrieve user details by providing the user ID
get.summary: Get a specific user by ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of all users with pagination support
